qualityCommitment.title: Our Commitment to Quality
qualityCommitment.description: Kemet Garment is built on transparency and continuous improvement. Our certification journey is underway, and our processes already align with international standards.
items: Precision stitching with standardized work instructions

whyEgypt.title: Why Egyptian Manufacturing?
whyEgypt.subtitle: Strategic advantages that make Alexandria your ideal manufacturing partner.

strategicLocation.title: Strategic Location
strategicLocation.desc: Alexandria port provides fast, cost-efficient access to Europe, the Middle East, and Africa, supported by preferential trade agreements with the EU and USA.

costCompetitive.title: Cost Competitive
costCompetitive.desc: 30–40% cost savings compared to Western manufacturing without compromising quality. Maximize your margins while maintaining global standards.

exportReady.title: Export Ready
exportReady.desc: ISO 9001 Quality Management System in progress. Built to meet international compliance requirements and experienced in global shipping logistics.
